snippet: A man accused of orchestrating the killings of 13 Chinese sailors on the Mekong River last year was extradited Thursday from Laos, according to Xinhua, the Chinese news agency.
abstract: Naw Kham, man accused of orchestrating the killings of 13 Chinese sailors on the Mekong River in 2011, is extradited from Laos.
lead_paragraph: A man accused of orchestrating the killings of 13 Chinese sailors on the Mekong River last year was extradited Thursday from Laos, according to Xinhua, the Chinese news agency.
